sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-card class="box-card">
    <el-table :data="list" style="width: 100%">
      <el-table-column
        prop="orderId"
        label="ID"
        width="300"
        :formatter="formatOrderId"
        :class-name="setCellClassName"
      />
      <el-table-column prop="" label="用户Id" width="200" />
      <el-table-column prop="medicineName" label="物品明细" width="300" />
      <el-table-column prop="count" label="数量" width="300" />
      <el-table-column prop="price" label="单价" width="300" />
      <el-table-column prop="" label="下单时间" width="300" />
    </el-table>
  </el-card>
</template>

<script>
import { get } from "@/utils/request";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      list: [],
    };
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getOrderDetail();
  },
  methods: {
    getOrderDetail() {
      get("http://localhost:8080/allOrderDetail").then((res) => {
        this.list = res.data.data;
      });
    },
    formatOrderId(row, column, cellValue, index) {
      if (index === 0 || row.orderId !== this.list[index - 1].orderId) {
        // 如果是第一行或者和上一行的 orderId 不同，就返回当前 orderId 的值
        return row.orderId;
      }
      // 否则返回空字符串，使单元格合并
      return "";
    },
    // eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars
    setCellClassName(row, column, rowIndex, columnIndex) {
      if (
        rowIndex === 0 ||
        row.orderId !== this.list[rowIndex - 1].orderId
      ) {
        // 如果是第一行或者和上一行的 orderId 不同，就添加一个新的 CSS 类名
        return "merge-cell";
      }
      // 否则返回空字符串
      return "";
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.box-card {
  margin-top: 5px;
  margin-left: 15px;
  margin-right: 15px;
  height: 95%;
}

.merge-cell {
  white-space: nowrap; /* 不换行 */
}
</style>
